PAGE_001.title: The Chinese Mitten Crab
PAGE_001.text: The Chinese Mitten Crab is a predatory crab known for its hairy claws and its invasive intent. It lives in fresh waters.

PAGE_002.title: Sea Snail
PAGE_002.text: Sea snails are small marine gastropods found in shallow waters. They have spiral shells and move slowly.

PAGE_003.title: Fishing Boat
PAGE_003.text: Fishing boats allow fishermen to access deeper oceans. They vary in size and purpose.
